attributes.action: Ukraine needs a Petition and it needs the UK government to pass a law
attributes.additional_details: , schools, kindergartens, universities, private homes, bus stations and many other housing and institutions. I ask the government of Ukrainian refugees to pass a law that can help Ukrainian refugees to stay in the United Kingdom and who are already here, those who work and live in the United Kingdom for two or three years to continue to develop and work.
attributes.background: Ukrainian citizens who have been severely affected by the war to lose their homes, families, children, homes. rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create path to Settlement for Ukrainians in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700776
